image_prompt: Generate a Blizzard Concept Artists Styled fantasy landscape featuring a radiant apple tree with rune-carved bark. The tree stands amidst a grassy clearing, surrounded by ancient trees and a glowing moon. Include Elenor and Asher locked in a tense duel against the Mysterious Witch, with the Magical Fox aiding from a distance. Magical attacks are being used between the three adversaries, with iridescent magical particles illuminating this mystical realm.
scene: Elenor and Asher are locked in an intense duel with the Mysterious Witch. The Magical Fox is aiding from a distance, while magical attacks are being used fiercely between the three adversaries. Asher knows that one final strike with his sword might be the only thing that can save them.
choices: Asher strikes the Witch with his sword
